name: Escapigs
description:
Description

Year 3004, Nohoka Royal Laboratory. Head Scientist, Prof. Boe Dyman hoping to find a breakthrough in the food industry started the test on a pig codenamed “Subject #1802”. When suddenly the pig start resisting the test and trying to free it self from the testing table. The pig knocked off a beaker full of chemical zetta, a well-known skinning agent onto itself. Turned The overdosed pig very skinny and craving to satisfy it desire for food. Luckily the lab just completed its newest invention “the satisfying ramen” that can help to ease “Subject 1802” hunger. Help “Subject 1802” to run around the lab to find food with its' power, teleportation.

Controls

[Space Bar]  - teleport the pig according to the Y-Axis of the shadow
